title: Jeanne Dickinson
deck:
During a difficult period in 1990, I needed answers, so started searching eventually finding what I’d been looking for at “One Voice” in October 1992. Getting to know God did not magically take away or prevent problems but gives me strength and hope through them.

I work in the community as a carer and at Gateway I’m part of the “Welcome” team. I’m happy to share my life experiences in order to encourage others.

I am married to Gary with a son and daughter.
